Research Experience

Research Assistant

IIIT-Hyderabad, India
2017 to Present

Working on image tampering detection and segmentation using convolutional neural networks under C.V. Jawahar.

Research Intern

INRIA, France
2016 Summer

Worked on action recognition from RGBD data. Proposed a CNN and LSTM hybrid model which uses a compact bilinear pooling model for obtaining a global representation of video. Project was undertaken under the guidance of Francois Bremnond.

Research Intern

Indian Institute of Science
2015 Summer

Worked on action recognition using 3D skeletal joints obtained using kinect sensor. Proposed an approach which obtained excellent results on standrad datasets. Quo admo
